App.description: Unique marketplace of design products will be here soon. In a meantime, subscribe for updates ❤️
ApplicationCreate.greetings: Greetings at your store registration stage on Holo-Apollo.art
ApplicationForm.StepOne.unknownError: Unknown error. Please contact us via email ira@holo-apollo.art or Instagram @holo.apollo.art. Error code: {errorCode}
ApplicationForm.StepOne.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
ApplicationForm.StepOne.usageAgreementRe: You must allow your data usage to create application
ApplicationForm.StepOne.invalidLength: Please write at least {minLength} symbols, but not more than {maxLength}
ApplicationForm.StepOne.sellingGoodsLabe: What's being sold in your store?
ApplicationForm.StepOne.dataUsageLabel: I allow usage of data I provided
ApplicationForm.StepTwo.errorsOccurred: Some errors occurred during images upload.

ApplicationForm.StepTwo.submitError: Error submitting file URL. File name: {fileName}, URL: {url}.
ApplicationForm.StepTwo.contactUs: Please try again in a moment or contact us via email ira@holo-apollo.art or Instagram @holo.apollo.art.
ApplicationForm.StepTwo.loadingText: We are loading your photos. Please wait a moment
ApplicationForm.StepTwo.imagesLabel: Upload photos of your goods in good quality
ApplicationForm.StepTwo.imagesHelpText1: At least {minNumber} and at most {maxNumber} photos, total size up to {maxSize} MB.
ApplicationForm.StepTwo.imagesHelpText2: Photos will be used in a collage, therefore some of them should have minimal, neutral background.
ApplicationForm.StepTwo.tooBigImages: Total size of images is too big. Maximum size is {maxSize} MB, you uploaded {actualSize}
ApplicationLayout.showroomDescription: Online showroom Design Made in UA
ApplicationSuccess.submittedSuccessfully: Your application has been submitted successfully.
ApplicationSuccess.confirmation: You will receive publication confirmation on your email very soon.
ApplicationSuccess.pubDateExplanation: This is a preliminary date of publication about you on our instapage.
